events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster, specifically for the software engineering role, based on your resume and experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the hiring process and address any queries you might have.
Your initial screening was completed successfully; the recruiter noted your strong foundational knowledge and relevant engineering experience.
Thank you for promptly responding to our initial queries and confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-20T14:00:00Z where you will meet with senior engineers to discuss your coding skills and problem-solving approaches.
You completed the technical interview with strong performance, demonstrating excellent knowledge in software development and system design.
The HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-22T11:00:00Z to discuss your cultural fit and employment terms.
Your HR interview went well; the HR team appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with the company values.
An official job offer has been proposed outlining the salary, benefits, and start date for the Software Engineer role.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the job offer and are thrilled about the possibility of you joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer; we are excited to welcome you aboard and start the onboarding process promptly.
Your onboarding process has officially started, including orientation sessions and setup for your development environment.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with your start as a Software Engineer; welcome to the team!
